text: The worst food i ever had it was it was horrible the barmaid was drunk the place didn't look very clean not very good service the whole experience was horrible I will never go back red hair in my food the lady in the kitchen with smoking in the kitchen
We had lunch on a Thursday at noon. The food was Ok and priced good. The waitress was excellent and friendly. The food took longer than we thought it should, but it wasn't crazy.
It's now Red, White and Blue Bar and grill. But this is my first time here and it seems like and awsome place! The beer is very good!
